Articles.Content: Has anyone checked this with 0.90 After I test my current batch of mods, I might test it myself.

Has anyone checked this with 0.90 After I test my current batch of mods, I might test it myself.

I think it works

Sarbian, Gimbal AutoTrim saved my mission tonight. I had a Mun ship with three radial engine pods on a Mun sightseeing mission. My pilot goofed the last (EVA) landing, so I lost an engine pod. With this plugin, I had a 15 deg thrust trim, and he managed to bring the ship home!

Made 200k kredits and 800 science on the mission, Thanks!
If this gets integrated into the KM Gimbal plugin it will be the best thing ever.
I miss this for KSP 1.0.2 a LOT!
Have you looked at the MechJeb thread recently? Or clicked on the author's name and checked last activity? I'd say sarbian is pretty active.

Hello,

Has anyone tried this with 1.0.4 (<--- I think that's the latest number)?
What exactly is stopping this from working in 1.0.4? I'm really missing this addon now, as I can't seem to get KM Gimbal 3 to work properly...

I don't mean to pester, but lots of us would like this plugin updated to work again.

We all know Serbian is very busy with his other mods, so he can take his time.
+1 for Gimbal Auto Trim! My Borealis shuttle awaits!
